Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave./Kostner
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave,, Grand, Cicero and North Ave. due to street blockage near North Ave./Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave,, Grand, Cicero, then resume their normal route on North Ave. due to street blockage near North Ave./Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.
